definition: an advanced student or graduate in any field gaining supervised practical experience, usually unpaid, work to gain experience in an advanced field
details:
noun
- an advanced student or graduate in any field gaining supervised practical experience, usually unpaid
= example: an advanced student or graduate in any field gaining supervised practical experience, usually unpaid
= synonyms: interne, houseman, medical intern
verb
- work to gain experience in an advanced field
= example: work to gain experience in an advanced field
- deprive of freedom, usually in a confined area
= example: deprive of freedom, usually in a confined area
= synonyms: confine, detain
